tool_description: Mimvi App Search provides mobile app search, discovery and recommendation services.  Based on proprietary biomimetic algorithms, Mimvi App Search delivers the best coverage and most relevant mobile apps, mobile content and mobile products.  Coverage includes:  iTunes, Google Play (Android), Windows Phone 7, Windows Phone 8, Facebook, Blackberry, Web Apps.
name: appsearch
title: appsearch

api_list.name: search

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: URL-encoded search query of 1,000 character maximum

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: where to start in the result list, integer

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: how many results to return; may be limited by api; deverlopers are responsbile for counting hte number of returned results

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: optional; empty=all; otherwise one of the following:  android, blackberry, facebook, ipad, itunes, mobileweb, windows

api_list.name: recommendations
api_list.description: given one app as input, get recommended apps as output

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: optional; same enumerations as search method
